servinfo.title: DTC B1718: Steering Lock Unit Communication Error

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Immobilizer Control System Wiring Circuit Diagram:For Diesel Engine Model .

servinfosub.title: Circuit Description
servinfosub.ptxt: When the verification code in the ECM is registered in immobilizer control system, the ID code is registered in both ECM and keyless start control module at the same time. This DTC is detected only in case that the ID code cannot be registered in both ECM and keyless start control module when the verification code in the ECM is registered in immobilizer control system.

item.ptxt: Troubleshoot DTC B1716 first if both DTC B1716 and B1718 are detected at the same time.

After replacing ECM, be sure to perform Procedure after ECM Replacement:For Diesel Engine Model . After replacing the keyless start control module, be sure to perform Procedure after ECM Replacement:For Diesel Engine Model .
While registering the verification code in the ECM in immobilizer control system, the keyless start control module sent a signal to ECM indicating that the ID code could not be registered.
The ID code could not be registered in the keyless start control module or ECM.
Wire circuits between steering lock unit and keyless start control module faulty

action.ptxt: Go to Immobilizer Control System Check:For Diesel Engine Model .

testgroup.title: Registration of ECM

test1.ptxt: Register ECM to immobilizer control system referring to Procedure after ECM Replacement:For Diesel Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Was registration of ECM to immobilizer control system completed?

action.ptxt: Recheck ECM for DTC. If DTC B1718 is still detected, go to Step 3.

testgroup.title: DTC check
testgroup.question: Is DTC other than B1718 detected?

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

testgroup.title: DTC check for keyless start control module

test1.ptxt: Check Keyless start control module for DTC referring to DTC Check .

testgroup.question: Is DTC detected?

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

testgroup.title: Check for communication circuit between steering lock unit and keyless start control module

test1.ptxt: With the ignition switch at OFF position, disconnect steering lock unit connector and keyless start control module connector.
Check for proper connection at terminals and wires of each connector referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

If OK, check for open, short, and high resistance in each circuit between steering lock unit and keyless start control module. Refer to Step 2 in DTC No. 11: Communication Error with Steering Lock Unit .

testgroup.question: Is each circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: Steering lock unit power supply check

test1.ptxt: Connect keyless start control module connector.
With ignition switch at ON position, check power supply terminal voltage of steering lock unit connector. Refer to Keyless Start Control Module Power and Ground Circuit Check .

testgroup.question: Is voltage 4 – 6 V?

action.ptxt: Replace steering lock unit and recheck.
Substitute a known-good keyless start control module and recheck. If DTC B1718 is still detected, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
